description.text: Destroy or rebuild the ruins whilst defending your Base. Two Cubes and a Base.

ru.original: Destroy or rebuild the ruins whilst defending your Base. Two Cubes and a Base.
ru.translation: Уничтожь руины или отстрой их заново, защищая базу. Два куба и база.

es.original: Destroy or rebuild the ruins whilst defending your Base. Two Cubes and a Base.
es.translation:
Explora las ruinas de la isla.
Dos generadores y un núcleo.

de.original: Destroy or rebuild the ruins whilst defending your Base. Two Cubes and a Base.
de.translation: Zerstört die Ruinen oder baut sie wieder auf, während ihr eure Basis verteidigt. Zwei Generatoren und eine Basis.

fr.original: Destroy or rebuild the ruins whilst defending your Base. Two Cubes and a Base.
fr.translation: Détruisez ou reconstruisez les ruines tout en défendant votre base. Deux cubes et une base.

pt.original: Destroy or rebuild the ruins whilst defending your Base. Two Cubes and a Base.
pt.translation: Destrua ou reconstrua as ruinas enquanto defende sua Base. Dois Cubos e uma Base.
